case_title: Assistant Commissioner, SRB vs M/s. Elixir Securities Pakistan (Pvt.) Limited
issues: Clerical omission in calculation table of order-in-original dated 07.11.2014
Scope of Section 76 for correcting clerical and arithmetical errors

arguments.appellant: Correction of omission under Section 76 is valid as it was inadvertent and not deliberate.
arguments.respondent: Assistant Commissioner exceeded the scope of Section 76 by amending the order substantively.

decision.tribunal_rationale: Omission was clerical and within the scope of Section 76. No mal-intention or deliberate act was found.

additional_notes.implications: Registered person may file additional grounds in pending appeal.
